user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Amazon shopping website on a mobile device. The user is searching for "razer nari" in the search bar, with several suggestions displayed. Below the search suggestions, items are shown in the shopping cart, including an LG UltraGear gaming monitor priced at $199.99 and a MacBook Pro case priced at $19.80. The interface also provides options like adding to the cart or comparing with similar items.
